body: "Playwright Anna Yablonskaya is among the dead at Moscow’s Domodedovo airport today," writes Natalia Antonova. "We heard it from her family."
original_body: "Playwright Anna Yablonskaya is among the dead at Moscow’s Domodedovo airport today," writes Natalia Antonova. "We heard it from her family."
title: Russia, Ukraine: Playwright Anna Yablonskaya Killed at Domodedovo
